br.octahedron.cotopaxi.view.response
Class RenderableResponse

java.lang.Object
  br.octahedron.cotopaxi.view.response.ServletGenericResponse
      br.octahedron.cotopaxi.view.response.RenderableResponse
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerResponse
Direct Known Subclasses:
JSONResponse, TemplateResponse
public abstract class RenderableResponse
extends ServletGenericResponse

A ControllerResponse that can be intercepted.

Author:
Danilo Penna Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br

Method Detail

dispatch

public final void dispatch(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse servletResponse)
                    throws IOException
Description copied from interface: ControllerResponse
Dispatches this ControllerResponse through a HttpServletResponse.

Specified by:
dispatch in interface ControllerResponse
Specified by:
dispatch in class ServletGenericResponse
Parameters:
servletResponse - The HttpServletResponse to be used to dispatch this response.
Throws:
IOException - If some error occurs while dispatching

getWriter

public Writer getWriter()
Gets this Response's Writer to be used to render. If this method is called out of the dispatch execution scope, it throws an IllegalStateException. This method should be called only be ResponseInterceptors

Returns:
The writer to be used to render.

setWriter

public void setWriter(Writer writer)
Sets the writer to be used to render this response

Parameters:
writer - the writer to be used to render this response

addOutput

public void addOutput(String key,
                      Object value)
Adds a new object to output. If there's already exists an object for the given key, the original one is kept.

Parameters:
key - The object's key
value - The object's value
